title: WTB - help me finish T206 commons list
author: Wildfireschulte

posts.post_title: WTB - help me finish T206 commons list
posts.post_content:
Please help me finish off the "commons" on my list - any back, +/- G conditions, raw or graded - thanks for your help:
Ball (clev)
Charles
Downs
Doyle (NY, hands above head)
McIntyre (Brook & Chi)
Rhoades(arm ext)
Schlei(port)
Wagner (Pitt)

Also looking for Spoke, Young and LaJoie
Please let us all know if you are offered a Wagner (Pitt).

I had like 5 Wagner (Pitts) a week ago. Some member offered me $500 for them. Couldn't pass that kind of $$$ up!!!

Matt
I've found the Pitts Wagner to be particularly elusive - almost as tough as Reulbach with glove showing - not sure if others have had similar experience.
I have a Wagner (Pitt), but it's one of those worthless Drum backs

[quote name="GHCHambone" post=1274604]I have a Wagner (Pitt), but it's one of those worthless Drum backs[/QUOTE]

Too bad, if it had a Cobb back I might make you an offer.  :eek:
List reduced by 5 - keep them coming
